item.title: COMIL INVICTUS DD v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 26, 2025

COMIL INVICTUS DD v1.0 ETS2

You’re looking for a COMIL Invictus DD mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).
This is a very popular bus mod in the game’s community, particularly among players who enjoy the bus simulation experience.

Here’s a breakdown of what that means:
COMIL : This is a major Brazilian bus manufacturer.
Invictus DD : This is the name of their modern, double-decker bus model. The “DD” stands for “Double Decker.” These buses are known for their sleek, contemporary design and are used for long-distance luxury travel in Brazil and other South American countries.

A mod of this bus for ETS2 would likely include a highly detailed model of the vehicle, complete with realistic textures, animations, and a customizable interior. Modders often add a variety of paint jobs (liveries), accessories, and different chassis options to make the bus feel unique.

Credits: altec

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Shacman X6000 brasil v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 26, 2025

Shacman X6000 brasil v1.0 ETS2

The Shacman X6000 is a modern and advanced heavy-duty truck from the Chinese manufacturer Shaanxi Automobile Group. It’s the company’s flagship model, known for its high-tech features and efficient engines.
While Shacman is a major player in the global market, especially in Asia and Africa, its presence in Brazil is still relatively new and limited. The company has been working to introduce its trucks to the South American market, and the X6000 is a key part of that strategy.
In Brazil, you’ll find information about the Shacman X6000 mainly in industry news, trade shows, and online discussions among truck enthusiasts. It’s not a common sight on Brazilian roads yet, but it represents the company’s push to compete with established brands by offering powerful, high-technology trucks.
If you are a fan of truck simulators, such as American Truck Simulator or Euro Truck Simulator 2, a “Shacman X6000 Brasil” might also refer to a community-created mod that adds this truck to the game, complete with Brazilian paint jobs and accessories.

Credits: coreano doido

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Scania 113H v1.1 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 26, 2025

Scania 113H v1.1 1.55 ETS2

You’re looking for the Scania 113H mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), specifically one that’s compatible with game version 1.55.
The Scania 113H is a legendary heavy-duty truck produced by Scania from 1991 to 1996. It’s an iconic truck, especially in Brazil and other parts of South America, known for its powerful engine and distinctive design. Many truckers consider it a classic, and it has a huge fan base.
A mod of this truck for ETS2 would likely be highly detailed, featuring:
Realistic model and textures : A faithful recreation of the 113H’s exterior and interior.
Customization options: The ability to change parts like chassis, bumpers, exhausts, and other accessories.
Authentic sounds : A key part of any good truck mod is a realistic engine and horn sound.

The most important part of your request is the “v1.55”. This indicates you need a version of the mod that has been updated to work with the latest major update of ETS2. Older mods can cause game crashes or other bugs when the game updates.

Credits: rbr

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Ford F-Max Special Edition v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 26, 2025

Ford F-Max Special Edition v1.0 ETS2

The Ford F-Max is an official truck in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), so a “Special Edition” generally refers to either an official in-game variant released by SCS Software or a community-made mod.

Official Special Editions
SCS Software has created several official “special editions” for the F-Max, which are usually special paint jobs or accessories that celebrate a specific event. For example, there’s a 100th Anniversary Edition paint job that was released to commemorate the centenary of Ford Trucks.
To get these official editions, you generally just need to have the base game and possibly a specific DLC. They’re often part of a bundle or available as a separate, small purchase.

Community Mods
The term can also refer to a mod created by a community member. These mods can be considered “special” because they add features not available in the base game. This could include:
Customization Parts: Unique accessories, grilles, bumpers, and side skirts.
Special Paint Jobs: Highly detailed liveries, often with an artistic theme.
Unique Interiors: Custom interior designs with personalized textures and dashboards.

Credits: macareno

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Mapa Ceibo v3.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 26, 2025

Mapa Ceibo v3.0 ETS2

You’re asking about the Mapa Ceibo 3.0, which is a popular map mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).
This mod adds new territory and a new trucking experience to the game, focusing on a region not included in the standard ETS2 map. The “Ceibo” in the name refers to the ceibo tree, which is a national symbol of both Argentina and Uruguay, hinting at the map’s location.

What the Map Offers
South American Scenery : The mod brings the landscapes of Argentina and Uruguay to ETS2, with detailed cities, new roads, and unique scenery.
Realistic Feel: It is designed to be as realistic as possible, with custom assets, bus stations, and cargo specific to the region.
Compatibilit y: As with any large mod, it’s crucial to download the version that is compatible with your current ETS2 game version (e.g., v1.52, v1.53, or a later version). The mod creators often update the map to work with the latest game patches.
Focus on Detail : The developers pay close attention to environmental details, including new vegetation, road textures, and realistic traffic patterns to capture the feel of driving in that part of the world.

Credits: mapa ceibo

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
